title: HomeAdvisor Contractor Profile Setup: Complete Guide to Getting More Leads
description: Learn how to create and optimize your HomeAdvisor contractor profile to attract quality leads, build credibility, and grow your home service business.

seo.title: HomeAdvisor Contractor Profile Guide 2024 | Get More Home Service Leads
seo.description: Master HomeAdvisor contractor profile optimization with our comprehensive guide. Attract quality leads, build trust, and grow your service business.

sections.title: Complete the HomeAdvisor Application Process
sections.content:
Start your HomeAdvisor journey at pro.homeadvisor.com. The application process is thorough and includes background checks and verification steps.

Application Requirements:

  • Business license verification (where applicable)
  • Insurance certificate upload
  • Background check completion
  • Reference verification
  • Service area definition

Screening Process: HomeAdvisor conducts comprehensive background checks including criminal history, business registration verification, and insurance validation. This process typically takes 3-5 business days.

Be prepared to provide detailed information about your business history, experience level, and service capabilities.
tips: Have all required documents ready before starting the application
Be honest and thorough in your responses
Respond quickly to any verification requests

sections.title: Optimize Your Contractor Profile
sections.content:
Your HomeAdvisor profile is your digital storefront. Make it compelling and professional:

Business Information:

  • Write a detailed business description (300-500 words)
  • Highlight years of experience and specializations
  • Include relevant certifications and training
  • Specify service areas with precise geographic boundaries

Service Categories:

  • Select all relevant service categories you offer
  • Be specific about subcategories and specialties
  • Avoid selecting services you don't actually provide
  • Update service offerings as your business evolves

Professional Credentials: Upload certificates, licenses, and insurance documents. HomeAdvisor displays verification badges that build customer trust.
tips: Use keywords that homeowners search for in your description
Include specific brand names and materials you work with
Keep your service area realistic based on your capacity

sections.title: Create a Compelling Photo Showcase
sections.content:
Visual content is crucial for HomeAdvisor success. Homeowners want to see proof of quality work:

Project Photos:

  • Upload 15-25 high-quality before/after photos
  • Show a variety of project types and sizes
  • Include detail shots highlighting craftsmanship
  • Use good lighting and professional composition

Business Photos:

  • Professional headshot or team photo
  • Clean, organized work vehicles
  • Quality tools and equipment
  • Uniformed team members at work

Photo Guidelines:

  • Minimum resolution: 1024x768 pixels
  • No watermarks or promotional text
  • Recent work (within 2 years preferred)
  • Accurate representation of your capabilities
tips: Take photos during the golden hour for best lighting
Include a mix of interior and exterior projects
Update photos regularly with recent work

sections.title: Master the Lead Bidding System
sections.content:
HomeAdvisor uses a lead bidding system where contractors compete for customer projects:

Understanding Lead Costs:

  • Lead prices vary by service type and location
  • More competitive markets have higher lead costs
  • Specialty services often have premium pricing
  • Set daily and monthly spending limits

Bidding Strategy:

  • Review lead details carefully before bidding
  • Bid on leads that match your capabilities exactly
  • Consider project size and profitability
  • Factor in travel time and distance

Lead Quality Assessment:

  • Look for detailed project descriptions
  • Prefer leads with realistic budgets
  • Avoid leads with unrealistic timelines
  • Check customer contact information completeness
tips: Start with a conservative daily budget and adjust based on results
Focus on service categories where you excel

sections.title: Optimize Customer Communication
sections.content:
Quick, professional communication is essential for HomeAdvisor success:

Response Time Goals:

  • Contact leads within 5-10 minutes of receiving them
  • Use the HomeAdvisor mobile app for instant notifications
  • Call first, then follow up with text or email
  • Be available during peak inquiry times (evenings/weekends)

Initial Contact Best Practices:

  • Introduce yourself and your company professionally
  • Reference the specific project they posted
  • Ask clarifying questions about their needs
  • Offer to schedule a free consultation

Follow-up Strategy:

  • Send detailed estimates within 24 hours
  • Include multiple service options when appropriate
  • Follow up if you don't hear back within 2-3 days
  • Maintain professional communication throughout
tips: Create templates for common response scenarios
Use the customer's name in all communications
Be specific about next steps and timelines

sections.title: Build a Strong Review and Reputation
sections.content:
Reviews are critical for HomeAdvisor success. Develop a systematic approach to earning positive reviews:

Earning Positive Reviews:

  • Exceed customer expectations on every project
  • Communicate clearly throughout the project
  • Clean up thoroughly after completing work
  • Follow up to ensure customer satisfaction

Review Request Strategy:

  • Ask for reviews immediately after project completion
  • Provide step-by-step instructions for leaving reviews
  • Send follow-up emails with review links
  • Offer small incentives for honest reviews (where allowed)

Managing Negative Reviews:

  • Respond professionally and promptly
  • Acknowledge the customer's concerns
  • Offer to resolve issues offline
  • Learn from feedback to improve service

Maintain a 4.5+ star average with at least 25 reviews for optimal lead flow.
tips: Send review requests within 48 hours of project completion
Include review request cards with final invoices
Monitor your reviews weekly and respond to all feedback
